entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7 except minus 12 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7 except minus 12 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
